title: "Database startup Redis Labs rebrands as … just Redis"
excerpt: "Database startup Redis Labs Inc. is dropping the “Labs” part from its name as part of rebrand, and will henceforth be known simply as “Redis.” The 10-year-old startup said the name change signals the maturation of a company that has recently become one of the hottest properties in the database management market,"
